questions.question: What is your preference for a cigarette filter?
options: I strongly prefer a non-filter cigarette
I slightly prefer a non-filter cigarette
I strongly prefer a filter cigarette

questions.question: What is your preference for cigarette length?
options: I strongly prefer the regular king size length
I slightly prefer the regular king size length
I slightly prefer the longer 100mm length
I strongly prefer the longer 100mm length

questions.question: What is your preference for tar and nicotine content?
options: More tar and nicotine than most cigarettes
Or the lowest tar and nicotine available today

questions.question: What is your preference for cigarette strength?
options: Or much less strong than most cigarettes

questions.question: What type of cigarette do you prefer?
What type of people do you prefer to smoke the same cigarette as you?
options: A cigarette smoked mainly by men
A cigarette smoked somewhat more by men than by women
A cigarette smoked somewhat more by women than by men
A cigarette smoked mainly by women

statements.statement: It's very important to me that the cigarette I smoke has a strong taste.
It's very important to me that the cigarette I smoke has the lowest tar and nicotine.
When choosing a cigarette, I choose it for taste even if it has a lot of tar and nicotine.
